ygData.subject: Re: What do you think about a few new spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that ... I agree with this.  Something needs to be said, and doing it as one voice would be more effective. The things I have liked the most, and that are
ygData.messageBody:
> This way we can all send the same request to Verant and we can show them
that
> Wizards have voices too! (not only Enchanters)

I agree with this. Something needs to be said, and doing it as one voice
would be more effective.
The things I have liked the most, and that are still inline with what a
wizard is are the following:

Sood spell ideas:
Summon - Teleports group member inside the zone to your location
Phase - Teleports yourself to location of other group member inside zone
Tap Afinity - Teleport group member to their own bind spot
Haste - Increases movement rate for self only.
Group Gate - Slow casting spell which teleports group to your bind spot,
doesn't leave anyone behind
Retreat - Evacuate version of group gate

Also, I think the most important fix that needs to addressed is finishing
the specialization skills. I see these as an inportant part to making the
wizard what they should be, but as yet are still missing.

-Shadowwalker of Karana
